text: The following English statements aregven 1 Anything that anyone eats and is not killed by eating tt, 1s food 2 John eats any kind of focd 3 Apples are food 4 Chicken is food 5 Bill eats peanuts, and Is not killed by eating 1t 6 Sue eats everything that Bill eats (a) Convert the statements to First Order Logic statements The first statement has been provided already, convert the rest Remember to standardise your vaniables (7) 1 Yy, z[eats(y, 2) A ~Aalledfromeating(y z) = food(z)]
